data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Music - because this is related to music, not audio. There is
    already a Music::GUIDO module, which proposed to handle GUIDO scores

    ABC - because this deals with music in the ABC format (a very
    simple, yet powerful ascii text format for specifying notes for
    songs).

    Song - because this encapsulates data for an individual song in the
    ABC format.

    I also have a Music::ABC:Archive module ready, which handles
    collections of Music::ABC:Song objects...
